CustomField.description: Records the last Idea Theme assigned to an Idea. Used to record the decision made for an Idea to be part of a Theme, but the Idea was ultimately excluded from the Theme. Keeping the history of this decision can aid the process of selecting Ideas for future themes.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Records the last Idea Theme assigned to an Idea. Used to record the decision made for an Idea to be part of a Theme, but the Idea was ultimately excluded from the Theme.
CustomField.label: Idea Theme History
